Utilities

Learn how to build your website with boba!

Text

Text classes

Colors

Text color classes
Colors
To change text color add a .text-{COLOR} class. Colors are from boba's palette.
.text-red Add a .text-red with to make the text red Hello World, I'm red
.text-orange Add a .text-orange with to make the text orange Hello World, I'm orange
.text-yellow Add a .text-yellow with to make the text yellow Hello World, I'm yellow
.text-green Add a .text-green with to make the text green Hello World, I'm green
.text-teal Add a .text-teal with to make the text teal Hello World, I'm teal
.text-blue Add a .text-blue with to make the text blue Hello World, I'm blue
.text-indigo Add a .text-indigo with to make the text indigo Hello World, I'm indigo
.text-purple Add a .text-purple with to make the text purple Hello World, I'm purple
.text-pink Add a .text-pink with to make the text pink Hello World, I'm pink
.text-dark Add a .text-dark with to make the text dark Hello World, I'm dark
.text-light Add a .text-light with to make the text light Hello World, I'm light
.text-black Add a .text-black with to make the text black Hello World, I'm black
.text-white Add a .text-white with to make the text white Hello World, I'm white

Alignment

Text alignment classes
Alignment
To change text color add a .text-{ALIGNMENT} class.
.text-left Add a .text-left with to make the text left align
I'm left
.text-center Add a .text-center with to make the text center align
I'm center
.text-right Add a .text-right with to make the text right align
I'm right
